# Lumière Award for Best French-Language Film

The Lumière Award for Best French-Language Film () is a discontinued award given by the Académie des Lumières from 2003 to 2019. It rewarded the best French-language film made outside France each year. It replaced the Lumière Award for Best Foreign Film () that was awarded from 1996 to 2002. It was replaced in 2020 by the Lumière Award for Best International Co-Production.
